en.dissociate_info: This will dissociate the floating IP from this resource.
en.tip_info_floating_ip: Accidentally deleted floating IP can be recovered. In the case that the floating IP that have been applied by other users, it cannot be recovered.
en.tip_dissociate_into: The instance will not reachable via public network after dissociate.It still can be visited from public network via router's SNAT
en.release_floating_ip_tip_info: After the floating IP address is released, the floating IP address will remain in the IP resource pool, and all users can re-apply for use

zh-CN.tip_info_floating_ip: 可帮助用户恢复误删的公网IP；若该IP地址已经被其他用户申请了，则无法恢复。
zh-CN.tip_dissociate_into: 解除绑定之后云主机将不能通过公共网络使用,它仍然可以从公共网络通过路由器的SNAT访问。
zh-CN.release_floating_ip_tip_info: 释放公网 IP 后，公网 IP 会保持在 IP 资源池里，所有用户可以重新申请使用
